targetString: Ikiwa kwa kawaida unatazama habari mara mbili kwa siku basi fuata ratiba hii na ufanye mambo mengine, badala ya kupata habari kwa saa 24 kila wakati.

sourceString: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
targetString: Virusi vya korona kama vya SARS ya popo WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), pia ambavyo wakati mwingine hutiwa virusi vya korona kama vya SARS  WIV1, ni ugonjwa wa matatizo sugu ya upumuaji yanayohusika na virusi vya korona (SARSr-CoV) vilivyotengwa kutoka kwa spishi ya popo huko Uchina (Rhinolophus sinicus).

sourceString: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
targetString: Kama virusi vya korona, chembe kimoja cha virusi kina RNA chanya ya kamba moja kilichofunikwa ndani ya gubiko.

sourceString: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ugunduzi huo unathibitisha kuwa popi ni hifadhi ya asili ya SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa filojenitiki unaonyesha uwezekanao wa maambukizi ya moja kwa moja kutoka kwa popo kwenda kwa wanadamu bila kizuizi cha ngawa za Kichina, kama ilivyokuwa ikiaminiwa hapo awali.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: Utengenezaji wa dawa ya COVID-19 ni mchakato wa utafiti wa kutengeneza chanjo ya kinga au dawa ya matibabu ambayo inaweza kuondoa ukali wa ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona  2019-20 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
targetString: Jukwaa la Usajili wa Majaribio ya Kimatibabu la Kimataifa la WHO lilirekodi tafiti 536 za kimatibabu ili kutengeneza matibabu ya baada ya maambukizi kwa maambukizi ya COVID-19, na kemikali nyingi zilizopatikana za kingavirusi za kutibu maambukizi mengine chini ya utafiti wa kimatibabu zikielekezwa kwingine.

sourceString: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Mnamo Machi, WHO ilianzisha "Jaribio la MSHIKAMANO" katika nchi 10, lililowasajili maelfu ya watu walioambukizwa COVID-19 ili kutathmini matokeo ya matibabu ya kemikali nne zinazopatikana za kuzuia virusi zinazoonyesha ufanisi zaidi.

sourceString: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
targetString: Uhakiki changamani, wa kimfumo ulianzishwa mnamo Aprili 2020 kufuatilia maendeleo ya majaribio yaliyosajiliwa ya kimatibabu ya chanjo ya COVID-19 na dawa zilizoteuliwa za matibabu. Utengenezaji wa chanjo na dawa ni mchakato uaohusisha hatua nyingi, unaohitaji kwa kawaida zaidi ya miaka mitano ili kuhakikisha usalama na kemikali mpya.

sourceString: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
targetString: Utengenezaji wa dawa ni mchakato wa kuleta chanjo au dawa ya matibabu ya ugonjwa unaoambukiza kwenye soko punde kemikali kuu inapotambuliwa kupitia mchakato wa kugundua dawa.

sourceString: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
targetString: Unajumuisha utafiti wa maabara kuhusu vijiumbe na wanyama, kuwasilisha hali za kisheria, kama vile kupitia FDA, kwa dawa mpya  ya uchunguzi ili kuanzisha majaribio ya kimatibabu kwa wanadamu, na unaweza kujumuisha hatua za kupata idhini ya kisheria kwa maombi mapya ya dawa ili kutangaza dawa hiyo.

sourceString: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
targetString: Utengenezaji wa chanjo au dawa ya kingavirusi ya COVID 19 huanza kwa kulinganisha dhana ya kemikali na mbinu inayowezekana ya kinga ya chanjo za baadaye au shughuli za kingavirusi katika vivo.

sourceString: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
targetString: Vitengo vipya vya kemikali (NCE, vinavyojulikana pia kama vitengo vipya vya molekuli au NME) ni kemikali ambazo zinatokana na mchakato wa ugunduaji wa dawa ili kubainisha chanjo au dawa ya kingavirusi.

sourceString: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
targetString: Vitengo hivi vina shughuli ya kuaminika dhidi ya lengo la kibiolojia linalohusiana na ugonjwa wa COVID-19.

sourceString: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
targetString: Mwanzo wa utengenezaji wa chanjo au dawa, mengi hayajulikani kuhusu usalama, sumu, hali ya dawa, na metaboli ya NCE katika wanadamu.

sourceString: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
targetString: Ni kazi na jukumu la utengenezaji wa dawa kutathmini vigezo hivi vyote kabla ya majaribio ya kimatibabu kwa binadamu ili kudhibitisha usalama na ufanisi.

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Lengo lingine kuu la utengenezaji wa dawa ni kupendekeza dozi na ratiba ya matumizi ya kwanza katika jaribio la matibabu kwa binadamu ("kwanza katika binadamu: [FIH] au Dozi ya Kwanza ya Binadamu [FHD], iliyojulikana awali kama 'kwanza katika binadamu" [FIM]).

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Kwa kuongezea, utengenezaji wa dawa lazima uweke sifa za kitabia za NCE: asili ya kemikali, uthabiti, na umumuniyifu.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: Lazima watengenezaji waboreshe mchakato wanaotumia wa kutengeneza kemikali ili waweze kuongezea kemia ya dawa inayotoa miligramu, hadi kutengeneza kwa kilogramu na kiwango cha tani.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: Wanachunguza bidhaa zaidi ili kuona kama zinafaa kufungwa kama vidonge, tembe, aerosoli, dawa ya kudungwa kwenye misuli, dawa ya kudungwa kwenye ngozi, au mchanganyiko wa kudungwa.

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Kwa pamoja, michakato hii inajulikana katika utengenezaji wa kabla wa kimatibabu kama kemia, utengenezaji, na udhibiti (CMC). Hali nyingi za utengenezaji wa dawa zinalenga kuridhisha mahitaji ya kisheria ya mamlaka ya inayotoa leseni ya dawa.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Kwa jumla hii inahusisha vipimo vilivyobuniwa kubainisha sumu kuu katika mchanganyiko mpya kabla ya matumizi ya kwanza katika binadamu.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Serikali ya Canada imetangaza milioni dola 275 za Canada katika ufadhili kwa miradi 96 ya utafiti kuhusu hatua za kimatibabu za kukabiliana na COVID-19, ikiwa ni pamoja na chanjo kadhaa zilizochaguliwa na vyuo vikuu vya Canada, na mipango ya kuanzisha "benki ya chanjo" ya chanjo mpya za kutumika ikiwa mlipuko mwingine wa virusi vya korona utatokea.

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Mipango ya majaribio ya kimatibabu inajumuisha awamu tatu za miaka kadhaa kuwadia kuidhinisha bidhaa, na nne, awamu ya baada ya idhini kwa ufuatiliaji unaoendelea wa usalama wa chanjo au matibabu ya dawa:

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: Vipimo vya awamu ya I, kwa kawaida katika watu wanaojitolea wenye afya, huamua usalama na kipimo cha dawa.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: Vipimo vya awamu ya II hutumika kuanzisha usomaji wa kwanza wa ufanisi na kuchunguza zaidi usalama katika idadi ndogo ya watu wenye ugonjwa wanaolengwa na NCE.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Vipimo vya awamu ya III ni vikubwa, vipimo muhimu vya kujua usalama na ufanisi katika idadi kubwa ya watu wenye maambukizo ya COVID-19.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: Ikiwa usalama na ufanisi umethibitishwa vizuri, vipimo vya kliniki vinaweza kukoma katika hatua hii na NCE kuendendelea na hatua ya matumizi ya dawa mpya ili kuanza uuzaji.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: Vipimo vya awamu ya IV ni vipimo vya baada ya idhini ambayo inaweza kuwa hali iliyowekwa na FDA, pia inajulikana kama utafiti wa ufuatiliaji baada ya uuzaji.

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Kwa kuongezea vipimo vinavyohitajika kutoa chanjo kipya au dawa ya kukinga virusi kwa kliniki kwa mara ya kwanza, lazima watengenezaji wahakikishe kuwa sumu zozote za muda mrefu au za kudumu zimetambuliwa vizuri, ikiwemo athari kwenye mifumo ambayo haijachunguzwa hapo awali (uwezo wa kupata mimba, uzazi, mfumo wa kinga, kati ya zingine).

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: Huko Marekani, mchakato huu unajulikana kama "matumizi ya dawa mpya" au NDA.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: Muundo unaoendelea wa vipimo vya kliniki unaweza kurekebishwa kama "muundo unaoweza kubadilika" ikiwa kukusanya data katika vipimo kunatoa ufahamu wa mapema wa ufanisi mzuri au mbaya wa matibabu.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Vipimo vya Umoja wa kimataifa na Ugunduzi wa Ulaya wa watu waliolazwa kwa sababu ya maambukizo kali ya COVID-19 hutumia muundo unaoweza kubadilika ili kugeuza haraka vigezo vya vipimo huku matokeo kutoka kwa mikakati nne ya majaribio ya matibabu kuibuka.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
targetString: Miundo inayoweza kubadilika ndani ya vipimo vinavyoendelea vya Awamu ya II-II katika matibabu yaliyoteuliwa inaweza kufupisha muda wa majaribio na kutumia wahusika wachache, ikiwezekana kuharakisha maamuzi ya kukamilisha mapema au kufaulu, na kuratibu mabadiliko ya muundo kwa majaribio fulani katika maeneo yake ya kimataifa.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
targetString: Dawa nyingi mpya zilizoteuliwa (NCE) huwa hazifaulu wakati wa maendeleo ya dawa, kwa sababu ina sumu isiyokubalika au kwa sababu hazithibitishi ufanisi katika ugonjwa unaolengwa, kama ilivyoonyeshwa katika vipimo vya kliniki vya Awamu ya II-III.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
targetString: Viwango vya juu vya kufeli  vinavyohusiana na maendeleo ya dawa hujulikana kama "kiwango cha kutoa", vinavyohitaji maamuzi wakati wa hatua za mwanzo za maendeleo ya dawa ili "kuua" miradi mapema kuepuka kufeli ya gharama kubwa.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
targetString: Utafiti mmoja katika mwaka wa 2010 uligundua gharama za ziada na zisizokuwa na marejesho za kuleta dawa moja moya kwa soko  kukaribia dola bilioni 1.8 na dola milioni 870, mtawalia.

sourceString: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
targetString: Makadirio ya gharama ya wastani ya majaribio ya mwaka wa 2015 hadi 2016 ya kukuza dawa 10 za kuzuia saratani ilikuwa dola milioni 648.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
targetString: Katika ukaguzi mwaka wa 2016 wa dawa 106 zilizoteuliwa na kutathminiwa kupitia vipimo vya kliniki, matumizi ya jumla ya mtaji kwa mtengenezaji mwenye dawa ilidhibitishwa kupitia vipimo vilivyofaulu vya Awamu ya III yalikuwa dola bilioni 2.6 (kwa dola za mwaka wa 2013), kiasi cha fedha kinachoongezeka kwa kiwango cha kila mwaka cha asilimia 8.5.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
targetString: Majaribio saba yalikuwa yakikagua dawa zilizotumika vingine na zilizoidhinishwa kutibu ugonjwa wa malaria, ikiwemo utafiti nne wa hydroxychloroquine au chloroquine phosphate.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Dawa za kukinga virusi zilizotumika vingine zinajumuisha utafiti zaidi huko Uchina, na majaribio ya Awamu ya III ya remdesiviri katika nchi kadhaa kwa sababu ya ripoti kabla ya mwisho wa Aprili.

sourceString: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
targetString: Ikiongozwa na Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation na washiriki wanaowekeza dola milioni 125 na kuratibu na Shirika la Afya Duniani, Kichocheo cha Matibabu ya COVID-19 kilianza mwezi wa Machi, kikiwezesha watafiti wa ukuzaji dawa kutambua haraka, kutatathmini, kukuza, na kuongeza matibabu yanayowezekana.

sourceString: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
targetString: Muungano wa Utafiti wa Kliniki wa COVID-19 uliundwa kuratibu na kuongeza matokeo kutoka kwa majaribio ya kliniki ya kimataifa katika matibabu yanayowezekana zaidi ya baada ya kuambukizwa.

sourceString: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
targetString: Mwanzoni mwa mwaka wa 2020, misombo anuwai iliyotengenezwa ya kukinga virusi na kutibu maambukizo mengine ilikuwa inatumika vingine au kukuzwa katika juhudi mpya za utafiti wa kliniki ili kupunguza ugonjwa wa COVID-19.

sourceString: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Dawa iliyoidhinishwa tayari (kama vile hydrichloroquine ya kutibu malaria), majaribio ya Awamu ya III-IV huamua kwa mamia hadi maelfu ya watu walioambukizwa na COVID-19 uwezekano wa matumizi ya ziada ya dawa iliyodhiitishwa tayari kutibu maambukizo ya COVID-19.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
targetString: Mapema Aprili 2020, dawa 103 zilizoteuliwa zilikuwa zinapimwa kwa wanyama au katika hatua ya maendeleo ya Awamu ya I-IV, na matokeo ya majaribio ya dawa 29 zilizoteuliwa kutarajiwa mwezi wa Aprili.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
targetString: Mwezi wa Machi, Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) lilizindua "jaribio la umoja" ulioratibiwa katika nchi 10 ili kukagua haraka maelfu ya watu walioambikizwa na COVID-19, ufanisi unaowezekana wa dawa za kuzuia virusi au kuzuia uvimbe ambazo bado hazijakaguliwa kwa ajili ya ugonjwa wa COVID-19.

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
targetString: Kuna dawa zozote zinazopunguza vifo?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
targetString: Dawa hizo hupunguza muda ambao mgonjwa analazwa hospitalini?

sourceString: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
targetString: Je, matibabu hayo huathiri hitaji la watu wenye nimonia ya COVID-19 kuongezwa hewa au kusalia katika kitengo cha huduma maalum?

sourceString: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
targetString: Je, dawa hazo zinaweza kutumiwa kupunguza ugonjwa wa maambukizo ya COVID-19 katika wafanyikazi wa huduma ya afya na watu walio katika hatari kubwa ya kupata ugonjwa mkali? Kuandikisha watu wenye maambukizo ya COVID-19 kunarahisishwa kwa kutumia uingizaji takwimu, ikiwemo idhini ya kuarifiwa, kwenye tovuti ya WHO.

sourceString: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
targetString: Baada ya jaribio, wafanyakazi huamua dawa zinazopatikana hospitalini, tovuti ya WHO huchagua mhusika aliyelazwa hospitalini bila utaratibu kuwa mmoja wa kufanyiwa majaribio ya dawa au kwa kiwango cha utunzaj wa hospitali kwa ajili ya matibabu ya COVID-19.

sourceString: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
targetString: Daktari wa majaribio hurekodi na kuwasilsha maelezo ya ufuatiliaji kuhusu hali na matibabu ya mhusika, kukamilisha uingizaji wa data kupitia tovuti ya WHO.

sourceString: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
targetString: Bodi ya kufuatilia usalama duniani ya madaktari wa WHO hukuchunguza matokeo ya muda ili kusaidia maamuzi  ya usalama na ufanisi wa dawa za majaribio, na kubadilisha muundo wa jaribio au kupendekeza dawa inayofaa.

sourceString: A similar web-based study to Solidarity, called "Discovery", was initiated in March across seven countries by INSERM (Paris, France).During March, funding for the Solidarity trial reached US$108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
targetString: Utafiti sawia unaotegemea tovuti wa Umoja, unaojulikana kama "Ugunduzi", ulianzishwa mwezi wa Machi katika nchi saba na INSERM (Paris, Ufaransa). Mwezi wa machi, ufadhili wa jaribo la Umoja ulifikia dola milioni 108 kutoka kwa watu 203,000, mashirika, na serikali, na nchi 45 zilizohusika katika ufhadhili au udhibiti wa jaribio.

sourceString: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
targetString: Dawa nyingi zilizoteuliwa zinazochunguzwa kama matibabu "yaliyokubaliwa" ya kupunguza maumivu wakati wa ugonjwa, kama vile NSAID AU bronchodilato, hazijajumuishwa kwenye jedwali hapa chini.

sourceString: Others in early-stage Phase II trials or numerous treatment candidates in Phase I trials, are also excluded.
targetString: Zingine katika majaribio ya hatua ya kwanza ya Awamu ya II au matibabu anuwai yaliyoteuliwa katika majaribio ya Awamu ya I, pia hazijaajumuishwa.

sourceString: Drug candidates in Phase I-II trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
targetString: Dawa zilizoteuliwa katika majaribio ya Awamu ua I-II zina kiwango cha chini cha mafanikio (chini ya asilimia 12%) kupita katika awamu za majaribio ili kupata idhini ya mwisho.

sourceString: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the United States.
targetString: Hydroxychloroquine inapatikana sana kuliko chloroquine huko Marekani.

sourceString: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with COVID-19, as of March 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the United States.
targetString: Ingawa nchi kadhaa hutumia chloroquine au hydroxychloroquine kwa matibabu ya watu waliolazwa hospitalini kwa sababu ya COVID-19, kuanzia March 2020 dawa hiyo haijaidhinishwa rasmi kupitia majaribu ya kliniki nchini Marekani..

sourceString: Chloroquine has been recommended by Chinese, South Korean and Italian health authorities for the treatment of COVID-19, although these agencies and the US CDC noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
targetString: Chloroquine imependekezwa na wizara ya afya huko Uchina, Korea Kusini na Italia kwa matibabu ya COVID-19, ingawa mashirika haya na CDC ya Marekani ilibaini madhara kwa watu wenye ugonjwa wa moyo au kisukari.

sourceString: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
targetString: Dawa zote zina mwingiliano mkubwa na dawa za kuagiza, zikiathiri dawa ya matibabu na kupunguza magonjwa.

sourceString: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.On 12 April, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in Brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for COVID-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
targetString: Watu wengine hupatwa na athari za mizio kwa dawa hizi. Tarehe 12 Aprili, jaribio la kliniki lililofanyiwa uchunguzi kwanza lililofanyika katika hospitali nchini Brazili ulikomeshwa wakati watu kadhaa waliopewa kipimo cha juu cha chloroquine kwa ajili ya mmambukizo ya COVID-19 walikuwa na viwango vya mapigo ya moyo yasiyo ya kawaida, na kusababisha vifo vya watu 11.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Majaribio ya kliniki ya Wachina huko Wuhan na Shenzhen yalionyesha kuwa favipiravir ilikuwa "fanisi kabisa".

sourceString: Of 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Wagonjwa 35 huko Shenzhen walipimwa na matokeo yao yalikuwa hasi katika wastani wa siku 4, ambapo urefu wa ugonjwa ulikuwa siku 11 kwa wagonjwa 45 ambao hawakupewa dawa hiyo.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Katika utafiti uliofanywa huko Wuhan kwa wagonjwa 240 wenye ugonjwa wa nimonia, nusu yao walipewa favipiravir na nusu walipewa umifenovir.

sourceString: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
targetString: Neno "uchunguzi wa kujaribu dawa" hufafanuliwa na utafiti wa maabara katika vitro na vivo, ukionyesha hatua za mwanzo za ukuzaji wa dawa, dawa ya kuzuia virusi au kingamwili za monoklonali, kama vile majaribio ya kuamua dawa fanisi na kiwango cha sumu, kabla ya dawa iliyoteuliwa inaendelezwa kwa ajili ya thathmni ya usalama na ufanisi kwa mwanadamu.

sourceString: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as COVID-19 treatments:

sourceString: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
targetString: Mwezi wa Machi 2020, protease kuu ya virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 ilitambuliwa kama shabaha ya dawa za baada ya kuambukizwa.

sourceString: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
targetString: Kimeng'enya hiki ni muhimu kwa seli enyeji ili kutoa asidi ya ribonucleic ya virusi hivyo.

sourceString: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.
targetString: Kupata kimeng'enya hicho, wanasayansi walitumia jenomu iliyochapishwa na watafiti Wachina mnamo Januari 2020 ili kutenga protease kuu.

sourceString: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two Phase III arms of the 2020 global Solidarity project on COVID-19.
targetString: Kama mchanyanyiko wa tiba inayowezekana, hutumiwa pamoja katika majaibio ya Awamu ya III ya mradi wa 2020 wa Umoja wa Kimataifa kuhusu COVID-19.

sourceString: A preliminary study in China of combined lopinavir and ritonavir found no effect in people hospitalized for COVID-19.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa kujaribu dawa nchini Uchina wa mchanganyiko wa lopinavir na ritonavir, haukupara athari kwa watu waliolazwa hospitalini kwa sababu ya COVID-19.

sourceString: It is unclear yet whether conditions arising during pregnancy including diabetes, cardiac failure, hypercoagulability or hypertension might represent additional risk factors for pregnant people as they do for nonpregnant people.From the limited data available, vertical transmission during the third trimester probably does not occur, or only occurs very rarely.
targetString: Haijulikani wazi ikiwa hali zinazotokea wakati wa ujauzito ikiwemo ugonjwa wa kisukari, matatizo ya moyo, shinikizo la juu la damu zinaweza kuwakilisha sababu za hatari kwa watu wajawazito kama zinavyofanya kwa watu wasio wajawazito. Kutoka wa data ndogo inayopatika, labda maambukizo ya ugonjwa hautatokea kwa mtoto wakati wa miezi mitatu ya mwisho, au hutokea mara chache sana.

sourceString: There is no data yet on early pregnancy.
targetString: Bado hakuna data ya ujauzito wa mapema.

sourceString: Little evidence exists to permit any solid conclusions about the nature of COVID-19 infection in pregnancy.
targetString: Ushahidi mdogo upo wa kudhibitisha hitimisho lolote dhabiti kuhusu asili ya maambukizo ya COVID-19 katika ujauzito.

sourceString: A case series of 43 women from New York who tested positive for COVID-19 showed similar patterns to non-pregnant adults: 86% had mild disease, 9.3% had severe disease and 4.7% developed critical disease.
targetString: Mfululizo wa visa vya wanawake 43 kutoka New York ambao walipatikana kuwa na COVID-19 ulionyesha hali kama hiyo kwa watu wazima wasio wajawazito: asilimia 86 walikuwa na ugonjwa usio mkali, asilimia 9.3 walikuwa na ugonjwa kali na asilimia 4.7 walikuwa na ugonjwa ya hali mahututi.

sourceString: Fetal distress was reported in two.
targetString: Watu wawili walipatikana kuwa na matatizo kwenye kijusi.

sourceString: None of the women developed severe COVID-19 pneumonia or died.
targetString: Hakuna wanawake walipatikana kuwa nimonia kali ya COVID-19 au kufa.

sourceString: All of them had live birth pregnancies and no severe neonatal asphyxia was observed.
targetString: Wote walikuwa na ujauzito mzuri na hakuna hali ya mtoto kukosa oksijeni ulionekana.

sourceString: The samples of breast milk, amniotic fluid, cord blood and neonatal throat swab were tested for SARS-CoV-2, and all results were negative.In another study on 15 pregnant women, majority of the patients presented with fever and cough, while laboratory tests yielded lymphocytopenia in 12 patients.
targetString: Sampuli za maziwa ya matiti, maji ya mimba, damu ya ugwe na maambukizo kwenye koo zilipimwa SARS-CoV-2, na matokeo yote yalikuwa hasi. Katika utafiti mwingine wa wanawake 15 wajawazito, wagonjwa wengine walionyesha homa na kukohoa, na vipimo vya maabara vilionyesha lympocytopenia kwa wagonjwa 12.

sourceString: Computed tomography findings of these patients were consistent with previous reports of non-pregnant patients, consisting of ground-glass opacities at early stage.
targetString: Matokeo ya eksrei kwa kutumia kompyuta ya wagonjwa hawa yalikuwa sawa na ripoti za awali kutoka kwa wagonjwa wasio wajawazito, yanayojumuisha matokeo ya rediolojia katika hatua za kwanza.

sourceString: Follow-up images after delivery showed no progression of pneumonia.Media reports indicate that over 100 women with COVID-19 might have delivered, and in March 2020, no maternal deaths were reported.
targetString: Picha za kufuatia baada ya kujifungua haukuonyesha maendeleo ya nimonia. Ripoti za vyombo za habari zinaonyesha kuwa zaidi ya wanawake 100 wenye COVID-19  wanaweza kuwa wamejifungua, na mnamo Machi 2020, hakuna vifo vya akina mama walioripotiwa.

sourceString: Their guidelines thus advise that any pregnant person admitted to hospital with a COVID-19 infection should receive at least 10 days of prophylactic low-molecular-weight heparin after being discharged from the hospital.
targetString: Kwa hivyo miongozo yao inashauri kuwa mtu yeyote ambaye ni mjamzito alliyelazwa hospitalini kwa sababu ya maambukizo ya COVID-19 anapaswa kupewa heparin yenye uzito wa chini wa molekuli kwa siku 10 baada ya kutolewa hospitalini.

sourceString: There are no data yet concerning the implications of COVID-19 infections for labour.
targetString: Bado hakuna data inayohusiana na matatizo ya maambukizo ya COVID-19 kwa uchungu wa uzazi.

sourceString: One infant girl born to a mother with COVID-19 had elevated IgM levels two hours after birth, suggesting that she had been infected in utero and supporting the possibility of vertical transmission in some cases.
targetString: Msichana mmoja mchanga aliyezaliwa na mama mwenye COVID-19 alikuwa na viwango vya juu vya IgM saa mbili baada ya kuzaliwa, na kupendekeza kuwa alikuwa ameambukizwa kwenye tumbo la uzazi na kuonyesha uwezekano wa maambukizo ya ugonjwa kwa mtoto katika baadhi ya visa.

sourceString: A small study involving 6 confirmed COVID-19 mothers showed no indication of SARS-COV-19 in their newborns' throats or serum but antibodies were present in neonatal blood sera samples, including IgM in two of the infants.
targetString: Utafiti mdogo unaohusisha mama 6 waliodhibitishwa kuwa na COVID-19 hawakuonyesha ishara yoyote ya SARS-COV-19 katika koo au damu ya watoto wao wachanga lakini kingamwili ilikuwepo katika sampuli za damu ya watato wachanga hao, ikiwemo IgM katika watoto wawili wachanga kati yao.

sourceString: This is not usually passed from mother to fetus so further research is required to know whether the virus crossed the placenta or whether placentas of women in the study were damaged or abnormal.
targetString: Kwa kawaida hii haipitishwi kutoka kwa mama kwenda kwa kijusi kwa hivyo uchunguzi zaidi unahitajika kujua ikiwa virusi hivyo vilipitia kwenye kondo au ikiwa kondo ya wanawake kwenye utafiti ilikuwa imeharibiwa au isiyo ya kawaida.

sourceString: Since COVID-19 shows similarities to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, it is likely that their effect on pregnancy are similar.
targetString: Kwa kuwa COVID-19 inaonyesha mfanano wa SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV, kuna uwezekano kuwa athari zao kwa ujauzito ni sawia.

sourceString: Four of seven had first trimester miscarriage, two of five had fetal growth restriction in the second trimester, and four of five had preterm birth.
targetString: Watu wanne kati ya saba, mimba yao iliharibika katika miezi mitatu ya kwanza, wawili kati ya tano walikuwa na kizuizi cha ukuaji wa kijusi katika miezi mitatu ya pili na wanne kati ya tano walizaa kabla ya wakati kufika.

sourceString: None of the newborns were infected with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Hakuna watoto wachanga waliozaliwa waliambukizwa na SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A report of ten cases of MERS- CoV infection in pregnancy in Saudi Arabia showed that the clinical presentation is variable, from mild to severe infection.
targetString: Ripoti ya visa kumi ya maambukizo ya MERS- Cov wakati wa ujauzito nchini Saudia Arabia ilionyesha kuwa uwasilishaji wa kiliniki unatofautiana, kutoka kwa maambukizo isiyo kali hadi kali.

sourceString: The outcome was favorable in a majority of the cases, but the infant death rate was 27%.A recent review suggested that COVID-19 appeared to be less lethal to mothers and infants than SARS and MERS but that there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks' gestation.
targetString: Matokeo yalikuwa mazuri katika visa vingi, lakini kiwango cha vifo vya watoto wachanga kilikuwa asilimia 27. Ukaguzi wa hivi karibuni ulionyesha kuwa COVID-19  ilionekana kuwa hasababishi vifo sana kwa mama na watoto wachanga kuliko SARS na MERS, lakini kunaweza kuwa na hatari iliyoongezeka kwa watoto waliozaliwa kabla ya wakati baada ya ujauzito wa wiki 28.

sourceString: The World Health Organization and  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention of the United States advises pregnant women to do the same things as the general public to avoid infection, such as covering cough, avoid interacting with sick people, cleaning hands with soap and water or sanitizer.

sourceString: A survey conducted in Shanghai among pregnant women in different trimesters of pregnancy identified a strong demand for online access to health information and services.

sourceString: People expecting their first baby were more willing to have online consultation and guidance than who had previously given birth.The RCOG and RCM recommend that in-person appointments be deferred by 7 days after the start of symptoms of COVID-19 or 14 days if another person in the household has symptoms.

sourceString: Fever subsequently developed in three asymptomatic patients.

targetString: Mgonjwa mmoja ambaye alikuwa amepimwa na matokeo yalikuwa hasi baadaye alionyesha dalili baada ya kujifungua na matokeo ya vipimo yalikuwa chanya siku tatu baada ya matokeo hasi ya kwanza.

targetString: Madaktari wanaofanya uchunguzi huo walipendekeza kuwa, ili kupunguza maambukizo na kutenga PPE, kwa sababu ya idadi kubwa ya wagonjwa wasioonyesha ugonjwa, uchunguzi wa wagonjwa wote wajawazito unapaswa kufanywa.

sourceString: They also suggest that people with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 should have continuous electronic fetal monitoring.

sourceString: In the UK, official recommendations state that precautionary separation of a mother and a healthy baby should not be undertaken lightly and that they should be kept together in the postpartum period where neonatal care is not required.Literature from China recommended separation of infected mothers from babies for 14 days.

Mwandishi kutoka Uchina alipendekeza mama walioambukizwa kutenganishwa na watoto kwa siku 14.

sourceString: In the US there is also the recommendation that newborns and mothers should be temporarily separated until transmission-based precautions are discontinued, and that where this is not possible the newborn should be kept 2 metres away from the mother.
targetString: Huko Marekani bado kuna pendekezo kuwa watoto wachanga na mama watenganishwe kwa muda hadi tahadhari zinazotegemea maambukizo zimekomeshwa, na ambapo hii haiwezekani, mtoto mchanga anapaswa kuweka umbali wa mita 2 kutoka kwa mama.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa b'COVID-19 unajumuisha kufuatilia ugonjwa kuenea ili kuweka mifumo ya maendeleo ya ugonjwa huo.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends active surveillance, with focus of case finding, testing and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios.
targetString: Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) linapendekeza uchunguzi amilifu, ukizingatia utafutaji wa kisa, upimaji na utafutaji wa utangamano katika hali zote za maambukizo.

sourceString: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa COVID-19 unatarajiwa kufuatilia mitindo ya ugonjwa, kugundua haraka visa vipya, na kulingana na maelezo haya, kutoa maelezo ya ugonjwa ili kufanya utathmini wa hatari na kutoa mwongozo wa utayarishaji wa magonjwa.

sourceString: Syndromic surveillance is done based on the symptoms of an individual that corresponds to COVID-19.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa dalili za ugonjwa hufanyika kulingana na dalili za mtu binafsi ambazo zinalingana na COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the WHO recommends the following case definitions:
targetString: Kufikia Machi 2020, WHO inapendekeza ifafanuzi wa visa vifuatavyo:

sourceString: Probable case : "A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive" OR "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
targetString: Kisa kinachowezekana: "Mtu anayeshukiwa ambaye upimaji wa virusi vya COVID-19 haujakamilika" AU " mtu anayeshukiwa ambaye hangeweza kufanyiwa upimaji kwa sababu yeyote".

sourceString: Confirmed case: "A person with laboratory confirmation of COVID-19 infection, irrespective of clinical signs and symptoms".
targetString: Kisa kilichodhibitishwa: "Mtu mwenye uthibitisho wa maabara ya maambukizo ya COVID-19, bila kujali ishara na dalili za kliniki".

sourceString: Direct physical contact with a probable or confirmed case;
targetString: Utangamano wa kimwili wa moja kwa moja na mtu anayeshukuwa au aliyedhibitishwa;

sourceString: Direct care for a patient with probable or confirmed COVID-19 disease without using proper personal protective equipment;
targetString: Utunzaji wa moja kwa moja bila kutumia vizuri vifaa sahihi vya kujikinga na mgonjwa anayeshukiwa au amedhibitishwa kuwa na ugonjwa wa COVID-19;

sourceString: Other situations as indicated by local risk assessments".WHO recommends reporting of probable and confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection within 48 hours of identification.
targetString: Hali zingine kama ilivyoonyeshwa na tathmini za hatari za ndani". WHO inapendekeza kuripoti watu wanaoshukuwa au wamedhibitishwa kuwa na maambukizo ya COVID-19 ndani ya saa 48 baada ya utambuzi.

sourceString: The countries should report on a case-by-case basis as far as possible, but in case of limitation in resources, aggregate weekly reporting is also possible.
targetString: Nchi zinapaswa kuripoti kwa msingi wa tukio-kwa-tukio iwezekanavyo, lakini ikiwa kuna upungufu wa rasilimali, ripoti ya jumla ya kila wiki inawezekana pia.

sourceString: Some organizations have created crowdsourced apps for syndromic surveillance, where people can report their symptoms to help researchers map areas with concentration of COVID-19 symptoms.
targetString: Baadhi ya mashirika wameunda programu ya ukusanyaji wa maelezo ya uchunguzi wa dalili, ambapo watu wanaweza kuripoti dalili zao ili kuwasaidia watafiti kualamisha maeneo yenye idadi kubwa ya dalili za COVID-19.

sourceString: Virological surveillance is done by using molecular tests for COVID-19.
targetString: Uchunguzi wa kivirolojia hufanywa kwa kutumia vipimo vya molekuli kwa COVID-19.

sourceString: WHO has published resources for laboratories on how to perform testing for COVID-19.
targetString: WHO imetoa rasilimali za maabara za jinsi ya kupima COVID-19.

sourceString: In the European Union, laboratory confirmed cases of COVID-19 are reported within 24 hours of identification.
targetString: Nchini Ulaya, visa vya COVID-19 vilivyodhibitishwa na maabra huripotiwa ndani ya saa 24 baada ya kutambuliwa.

sourceString: At least 24 countries have established digital surveillance of their citizens.
targetString: Angalau nchi 24 zimeanzisha uchunguzi wa kidijitali wa raia wao.

sourceString: The digital surveillance technologies include apps, location data and electronic tags.
targetString: Teknolojia za uchunguzi wa kidijitali zinajumuisha pogramu, data ya eneo na vitambulisho vya kielekroniki.

sourceString: The Center For Disease Control and Prevention in USA tracks the travel information of individuals using airline passenger data.
targetString: Kituo cha Udhbiti na Uzuizi wa Ugonjwa huko Marekani hufuatilia maelezo ya usafiri wa watu wanaotuma data za abiria wa ndege.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, authorities are requiring a bracelet and an app for all travellers.
targetString: Huko Hong Kong, mamlaka zinataka watu wawe na bangili na programu ya simu kwa wote wanaosafiri.

sourceString: A GPS app is used to track the locations of individuals in South Korea to ensure against quarantine breach, sending alerts to the user and to authorities if people leave designated areas.
targetString: Programu ya GPS hutumika kufuatilia maeneo ya watu huko Korea Kusini ili kuhakikisha hakuna kutoka karantini, kutuma arifa kwa mtumiaji na mamlaka ikiwa watu watatoka kwenye maeneo waliowekwa.

sourceString: In Singapore, individuals have to report their locations with photographic proof.
targetString: Huko Singapoo, lazima watu waripoti mahali walipo na ushahidi wa picha.

sourceString: Thailand is using an app and SIM cards for all travelers to enforce their quarantine.
targetString: Nchini Thailand inatumia programy na SIM kadi kwa wasafiri wote ili kutekeleza muda wao wa karantini.

sourceString: Human rights organizations have criticized some of these measures, asking the governments not to use the pandemic as a cover to introduce invasive digital surveillance.
targetString: Mashirika ya haki za kibinadamu yamekosoa baadhi ya hatu hizo, yakiwauliza serikali isitumie ugonjwa huo kama kisetiri cha kuanzisha uchunguzi wa kuingilia kwa njia ya kidijitali.

sourceString: b'Coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
targetString: b'Virusi vya korona ni kikundi cha virusi vinayohusiana vinavyosababisha magonjwa miongoni mwa wanyama na ndege.

sourceString: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
targetString: Kwa binadamu, virusi vya korona husababisha maambikizo ya njia ya pumu yanayoweza kuwa ya wastani au mbaya zaidi.

sourceString: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19.
targetString: Magonjwa kali yanajumuisha visa kadhaa vya mafua ya kawaida (ambayo ina sababu zingine zinazowezekana, rhinoviruses) wakati aina mbaya zaidi zinaweza kusababisha SARS, MERS, na COVID-19.

sourceString: Symptoms in other species vary: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
targetString: Dalili hutofautiana katika spishi zingine: kwa kuku, husababisha ugonjwa katika mfumo wa juu wa kupumua, ambapo kwa ng'ombe na nguruwe husababisha kuhara.

sourceString: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
targetString: Bado hakuna chanjp au dawa za kuzuia virusi au kutibu maambukizo ya virusi vya korona vya binadamau.

sourceString: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily Orthocoronavirinae, in the family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vinaunda famlia ndogo ya Orthocoronavirinae, katika familia ya Coronaviridae, Nidovirales, na realm Riboviria.

sourceString: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
targetString: Ni virusi vilivyofunikwa na jenomu chanya ya utungo mmoja wa RNA na ulinganifu wa muundo wa nucleocapsid.

sourceString: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Ukubwa wa genome ya virusi vya korona unatofautiana kuanzia takriban kilobesi 26 hadi 32, mojawapo ya gemone kubwa zaidi miongoni mwa virusi vya RNA.

sourceString: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
targetString: Zina tabia ya ncha kali zenye umbo la rungu ambazo huchomoza kutoka kwa maeneo yake, ambazo katika picha za kitaalamu za elektroni huunda picha inayofanana na korona ya jua ambapo jina ilitoka.

sourceString: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).
targetString: Virusi vya korona viligunduliwa kwa mara ya kwanza miaka ya 1930 wakati maambukizo kali yanayohusiana  na upumuaji katika kuku wa nyumbani ulionekana kusababishwa na virusi vya kuambukiza vya mkamba.

sourceString: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated.Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
targetString: Katika miaka ya 1940, virusi viwili zaidi vya korona vya mnyama, vilitengwa, virusi vya homa ya manjano vya panya (MHV), na virusi vya kuambukiza vya uvimbe wa tumbo (TGEV). Virusi vya korona vya wanadamau viligunduliwa miaka ya 1960.

sourceString: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.
targetString: Virusi vya kwanza vilivyofanyiwa utafiti vilitoka kwa binadamu wagonjwa wenye mafua ya kawaida, ambayo baadaye iliitwa virusi vya korona 229E na virusi vya korona vya wanadamu OC43.

sourceString: They were first imaged by Scottish virologist June Almeida at St. Thomas Hospital in London.
targetString: Walipigwa picha ya kwanza na mtaalamu wa virusi wa Uskoti June Almeida katika Hospitali ya St,Thomas huko London.

sourceString: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019.
targetString: Baadaye virusi vingine vya korona vimegunduliwa, ikijumuisha SARS-CoV mwaka wa 2003, HCoV NL63 mwaka wa 2004, HKU1 mwaka wa 2005, MERS-CoV mwaka wa 2012, na SARS-CoV-2 mwaka wa 2019.

sourceString: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
targetString: Virusi vingi vimehusisha maambukizo kali ya ya mfumo wa kupumua.

sourceString: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate the new family of viruses.
targetString: Jina hili lilitumika mara ya kwanza mnamo 1968 na kikundi kisicho rasmi cha wanavairolojia katika makala ya Asili ili kuashiria familia mpya ya virusi.

sourceString: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
targetString: Jina linamaanisha sifa ya kuonekana ya chembe cha virusi (umbo ya kuambukiza ya virusi) na darubini ya elektroni, ambavyo vina taswira ya maeneo kubwa, ya mviringo inayounda picha ya ukumbusho wa taji au korona ya jua.

sourceString: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.
targetString: Mofolojia hii imeundwa na miiba ya glikoprotini kwenye virusi, ambayo ni protini kwenye uso wa virusi.

sourceString: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.
targetString: Virusi vya korona ni chembe kubwa za mviringo mmoja vyenye taswira ya uso yenye umbo wa balbu.

sourceString: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (M), envelope (E) and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored.
targetString: Mfuniko wa virusi hizi katika picha ya kitaalamu ya elektroni huonekana kama jozi ya kipekee ya sheli nzito za elektroni. Mfuniko wa virusi una tabaka ya lipidi ambapo  protini za muundo za utando (M), mfuniko (E) na ncha kali (S) zimeshikilia.

sourceString: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.
targetString: Mfuniko wa tabaka mbili za lipidi, protini za utandao, na nucleocapsid hulinda virusi wakati viko nje ya seli mama.

sourceString: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded RNA genome.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vina genomu chanya ya nyuzi moja ya RNA

sourceString: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.
targetString: Ukubwa wa jenomu wa virusi vya korona ni kati ya kilobesi 26.4 hadi 31.7.

sourceString: The genome size is one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Ukubwa wa jenomu ni mojawapo kubwa kati ya virusi vya RNA.

sourceString: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.
targetString: Fremu wazi za kusoma za 1a na 1b, ambazo zinachukua theluthi mbili za kwanza za genomu, husimbua protini nyingi za relicase/transcriptase.

sourceString: The replicase/transcriptase polyprotein self cleaves to form nonstructural proteins.The later reading frames encode the four major structural proteins: spike, envelope, membrane, and nucleocapsid.
targetString: Protini nyingi za replicase/transcriptase hujikwamilia ili kuunda protini zisizo na muundo. Fremu za baadaye za kusoma husimbua protini nne kuu za muundo: ncha kali, mfuniko, utandao, na nucleocapsid.

sourceString: Interspersed between these reading frames are the reading frames for the accessory proteins.
targetString: Zilizochanganywa kati ya fremu hizi za kusona na fremu za kusoma za protini za ziada.

sourceString: The number of accessory proteins and their function is unique depending on the specific coronavirus.
targetString: Idadi ya protini ya ziada na kazi yao ni ya kipekee kulingana na virusi maalum vya korona.

sourceString: Infection begins when the viral spike (S) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
targetString: Maambukizi huanza wakati glaikoprotini (S) ya ncha kali ya virusi inapojiambatishwa kwa vipokezi vya ziada vya seli mama.

sourceString: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.
targetString: Baada ya kuambatisha, protisi ya seli mama hukwamilia na kuamilisha kipokezi kilichoambatishwa kwenye protini ya ncha kazi.

sourceString: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.On entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
targetString: Kulingana na protisi ianyopatikana ya seli mama, ukwamiliaji na uamilishaji huruhusu virusi kuingia kwenye seli mama kwa njia ya endocytosis au mchanganyiko wa moja kwa moja wa mfuniko wa virusi na utando mama. Baada ya kuingia kwenye seli mama, chembe cha virusi hufunguliwa, na genomu huingia sitoplazimu ya seli.

sourceString: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.
targetString: Ribosomu mama hutafsiri  fremu wazi ya kwanza inayopindana ya kusoma ya genomu ya vitusi na kuunda protini nyingi.

sourceString: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.
targetString: Protini nyingi zina protisi zake zenyewe ambazo hukwamilikia protini nyingi na kuwa protini mbalimbali zisizo kuwa na muundo.

sourceString: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).
targetString: Idadi ya protini zisizokuwa na muundo hushirikiana ili kuunda multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).

sourceString: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp).
targetString: Protini kuu ya replicase-transcriptase ndio RNA polymerase inayotegemea RNA (RdRp).

sourceString: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of RNA from an RNA strand.
targetString: Inahusika moja kwa moja katika urudufishaji na ufasili wa RNA kutoka kwa nyuzi ya RNA.

sourceString: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.
targetString: Protini nyingine zisizo na muundo katika uchangamano husaidia katika mchakato wa kurudufisha na ufasili.

sourceString: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks.One of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
targetString: Protini isiyokuwa na muundo ya exoribonclease, kwa mfano, hutoa uaminifu wa ziada wa urudufishaji kwa kutoa utendaji wa kupitia ambao polyemerase RNA inyotegemea RNA inakosa. Mojawapo ya kazi kuu za uchangamano huu ni kurudufu genomu ya virusi.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic RNA from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: RdRp hupatanisha moja kwa moja usanisi wa RNA genomiki ya hisia hasi kutoka kwa RNA genomikia ya hisia chanya.

sourceString: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic RNA from the negative-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: Hii inafuatwa na urududishaji wa RNA genomiki ya hisia chanya kutoka kwa RNA genomiki ya hisia hasi.

sourceString: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.
targetString: Kazi nyingine muhimu ya uchangamano ni kufasilia genomu ya virusi.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: RdRp hupatanisha moja kwa moja usanidi wa molekuli za RNA za genomiki ndogo za hisia hasi kutoka kwa RNA genomiki za hisia chanya.

sourceString: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mRNAs.
targetString: Hii inafuatiliwa na ufasili wa molekuli hizi za RNA za genomiki ndogo za hisia hasi kwa MRNAs zao zinazolingana za hisia chanya.

sourceString: The replicated positive-sense genomic RNA becomes the genome of the progeny viruses.
targetString: RNA genomiki inayorudufiwa ya hisia chanya inakuwa genomiki ya virusi vya kizazi.

sourceString: The mRNAs are gene transcripts of the last third of the virus genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.
targetString: mRNA ni hati za jini za theluthi ya mwisho wa genomu ya virusi baada ya kupindana kwa kwanza kwa fremu ya kusoma.

sourceString: These mRNAs are translated by the host's ribosomes into the structural proteins and a number of accessory proteins.
targetString: Chembe hizi za mRNS zinabadilishwa na ribosome za mwenye virusi kuwa protini za kimuundo na idadi fulani ya protini za ufikiaji.

sourceString: RNA translation occurs inside the endoplasmic reticulum.
targetString: RNA hubadilishwa ndani ya utumbo wa endoplasmiki.

sourceString: The viral structural proteins S, E, and M move along the secretory pathway into the Golgi intermediate compartment.
targetString: Protini za muundo wa virusi, S, E, na M husonga pamoja katika njia ya uzalishaji kwenye sehemu ya kati ya Golgi.

sourceString: There, the M proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.
targetString: Hapo, prorini ya M huelekeza miingiliano baina ya protini na protini inayohitajika inayohitajika kwa mkusanyiko wa virusi kufuatia kunatwa kwake kwenye nucleocapsidi.

sourceString: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis through secretory vesicles.
targetString: Virusi vya uzao kisha huachiliwa kutoka kwa seli mama na eksotisosi kupitia vilengelenge vya uzalishaji.

sourceString: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.
targetString: Mwingiliano wa protini ya ncha ya kali ya virusi vya korona na kipokezi chake cha ziada cha seli mama ni muhimu katika kubainisha ubadilishaji wa tishu, hali ya kuambukizwa, na masafa ya spishi ya virusi.

sourceString: The SARS coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya SARS, kwa mfano, huambukiza seli za binadamu kwa kuambatisha kipokezi cha (ACE2) cha kimeng'enya 2 cha kubadilisha angiotensin.

sourceString: The scientific name for coronavirus is Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.
targetString: Jina la kisayansi la virusi vya korona ni Orthocoronavirinae au Coronavirinae.

sourceString: Coronaviruses belong to the family of Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Virusi vya korona kibayolojia vinatokana na familia ya Coronaviridae, mpangilio wa Nidovirales na ulingo wa Riboviria.

sourceString: Genus Betacoronavirus; type species: Murine coronavirus
targetString: Genus Betacoronavirus; aina ya spishi: Murine coronavirus

sourceString: Species: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Human coronavirus OC43), Human coronavirus HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus bat coronavirus HKU5, Rousettus bat coronavirus HKU9, Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris bat coronavirus HKU4, Middle East respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)
targetString: Aina zake: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Human coronavirus OC43), Human coronavirus HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus bat coronavirus HKU5, Rousettus bat coronavirus HKU9, Ugonjwa mbaya wa matatizo ya kupumua yanayohusiana na virusi vya korona (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris bat coronavirus HKU4, Ugonjwa wa matatizo ya kupumua unaotoka Mashariki ya kati unaohusiana na virusi vya korona, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)

sourceString: Species: Beluga whale coronavirus SW1, Infectious bronchitis virus
targetString: Aina: Virusi vya korona vya nyangumi ya beluga sw1, virusi vya kuambukiza vya mkamba

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 BCE, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
targetString: Kizazi cha hivi punde cha virusi vyote ya korona (MRCA) kinakadiriwa kilikuwa hivi karibuni kama 8000 BCE, ingawa mifano kadhaa huchukua nafasi ya kizazi cha kawaida  kwa miaka milioni 55 au zaidi, ikimaanisha inashirikiana kuwa muda mrefu na aina ya spishi ya popo na ndege.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 BCE, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 BCE, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 BCE, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 BCE.
targetString: Kizazi cha hivi punde cha virusi cha alphacoronavirus kimewekwa kati ya takriban 2400 BCE, kizazi cha betacoronavirus katika 3300 BCE, kizazi cha gammacoronavirus katika 2800 BCE na kizazi cha deltacoronavirus katika takriban 3000 BCE.

sourceString: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.Many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.
targetString: Idadi kubwa ya bata yenye virusi na spishi za ndege, na aina yao duniani, imewezesha mageuzi na usambazaji mkubwa wa virusi vya korona. Virusi vingi vya korona vya wanadamu vimetoka kwa popo.

sourceString: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged sometime before 1960.
targetString: Vya hivi majuzi zaidi, virusi vya korona vya alpaca na virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu 229E vilitengana kabla ya 1960.

sourceString: MERS-CoV emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.
targetString: MERS-Cov iliibuka kwa wanadamu kutoka kwa popo ambayo iitoka kwa ngamia.

sourceString: MERS-CoV, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.
targetString: MERS-CoV, ingawa vinahusiana na aina nyingi za virusi vya korona vya popo, vinaonekana vilitengana karne kadhaa zilizopita.

sourceString: The most closely related bat coronavirus and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.
targetString: Virusi vya korona na SARS-C0V inavyohusiana sana na popo vilitofautiana mwaka wa 1986

sourceString: A possible path of evolution, of SARS coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that SARS related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.
targetString: Njia inayowezekana ya mageuzi, ya virusi vya korona vya SARS na virusi vya korona vya popo, inapendekeza kuwa virusi vya korona vinavyohusiana na SARS vilikuwa kwenye popo kwa muda mrefu.

sourceString: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.
targetString: Miaka ya 1790, virusi vya koroma vya farasi vilitoka kwa virusi vya korona vya ng'ombe baada ya kuruka kwenda kwa spishi nyingine.

sourceString: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus OC43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.
targetString: Baadaye katika miaka ya 1980, virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu OC43 vilitoka kwa virusi vya korona vya ng'ombe baada ya tukio lingine ya kuruka kwenda kwenye spishi nyingine.

sourceString: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
targetString: Inakisiwa kwamba maradhi ya mafua ya mwaka wa 1890 yanaweza kuwa yalisababishwa na tukio hili ya kuruka kwenda kwenye spishi nyine, lakini sio virusi vya mafua, kwa sababu ya muda husika, dalili za nyurolojia, dalili zingine zisizojulikana za ugonjwa huo.

sourceString: Human coronavirus OC43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu OC43 kando na kusababisha maambukizi ya njia ya kupumua pia vinashukiwa kusababisha magonjwa ya nyurolojia.

sourceString: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.
targetString: Miaka ya 1950, virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu vilianza kuibuka kama genitki ni za sasa.

sourceString: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (Murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to  human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.
targetString: Katika uvumbuzi wa kikundi fulani cha viumbe, virusi vya homa vya panya (virusi vya korona vya murine) ambayo huambukiza ini na mfumo mkuu wa neve wa panya, vinahusiana na virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu OC43 na virusi vya korona vya ng'ombe.

sourceString: Human coronavirus HKU1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu HKU1, kama virusi vilivyotajwa hapo awali, pia hutoka kwa wanyama wagugunaji.

sourceString: Coronaviruses vary significantly in risk factor.
targetString: Virusi vya korona hutofautiana sana kwa kiwango cha hatari.

sourceString: Some can kill more than 30% of those infected, such as MERS-CoV, and some are relatively harmless, such as the common cold.
targetString: Vingine vinaweza kuua zaidi ya asilimia 30 ya wale walioambukizwa, kama vile MERS-CoV, na vingine sio hatari sana, kama vile homa ya kawaida.

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause colds with major symptoms, such as fever, and a sore throat from swollen adenoids.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vinaweza kusababisha mafua yenye dalili kali, kama vile homa na mwasho wa koo kutoka kwa tushu zilizovimba.

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause pneumonia (either direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (either direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).
targetString: Virusi vya korona vinaweza kusababisha nimonia (aidha virusi vya moja kwa moja vya nimonia au nimonoa ya  bakteria ya pili) na mkamba (aidha virusi vya moja kwa moja vya mkamba au mkamba bakeria ya pili).

sourceString: The human coronavirus discovered in 2003, SARS-CoV, which causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), has a unique pathogenesis because it causes both upper and lower respiratory tract infections.Six species of human coronaviruses are known, with one species subdivided into two different strains, making seven strains of human coronaviruses altogether.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya binadamu vilivyogunduliwa mwaka wa 2003, ambavyo husababisha ugonjwa kali wa matatizo ya kupumua (SARS), vina pathogenisis ya kipekee kwa sababu huambukiza sehemu ya juu na chini ya kupumua. Aina sita za virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu vinajulikana, na aina moja imegawanywa katika aina mbili tofauti, na kutengeneza aina sita za virusi vya korona vya mwanadamu kwa pamoja.

sourceString: Four of these coronaviruses continually circulate in the human population and produce the generally mild symptoms of the common cold in adults and children worldwide: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.
targetString: Nne kati ya virusi hivi vya korona vinaendelea kusambazwa katika idadi ya watu na hutoa dalili za kawaida zisizo kali za mafua kwa watu wazima na watoto duniani: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.

sourceString: Coronaviruses cause about 15% of commons colds.
targetString: Virusi vya korona husababisha takriban asilimia 15 ya mafua ya kawaida.

sourceString: The majority of colds are caused by rhinoviruses.
targetString: Aina nyingi ya mafua husababishwa na rhinoviruses.

sourceString: The four mild coronaviruses have a seasonal incidence occurring in the winter months in temperate climates.
targetString: Virusi vinne kali vya korona hutokea wakati wa msimu wa baridi katika hali ya hewa ya wastani.

sourceString: There is no preference towards a particular season in tropical climates.
targetString: Hakuna upendeleo wa msimu fulani katika hali ya hewa ya kitropiki.
