targetString: Virusi vinne vya korona hutoa dalili ambazo ni kali kwa ujumla:

sourceString: The virus was officially named the SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).
targetString: Virusi hivyo vilipewa jina rasmi la (SARS-CoV).

sourceString: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
targetString: Zaidi ya watu 8,000 waliambukizwa, takriban asilimia kumi yao waliaga dunia.

sourceString: In September 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called Novel Coronavirus 2012, and now officially named Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Mwezi wa Septemba 2012, aina mpya ya virusi ya korona vilitambuliwa, hapo awali vilijukana kana virusi vipya vya korona vya 2012, na sasa vinajulikana kama virusi vya korona vya Mashariki ya Kati vya matatizo ya kupumua. (MERS-COv).

sourceString: The World Health Organization issued a global alert soon after.
targetString: Shirika la Afya Duniani lilitoa tahadhari ya ulimwengu punde tu baadaye.

sourceString: The WHO update on 28 September 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
targetString: Taarifa ya WHO ya tarehe 28 Septemba 2012 ilisema kwamba virusi hivi havikuonekana kusambaa kwa urahisi kutoka kwa mtu mmoja hadi mwingine.

sourceString: However, on 12 May 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in France was confirmed by the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
targetString: Hata hivyo, tarehe 12 Mei 2013, tukio la usambazaji kutoka kwa mtu mmoja hadi mwingine ulithibitishwa huko Ufarasana na Wizara ya Ufarasa ya Mambo ya Kijamii na Afya.

sourceString: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the Ministry of Health in Tunisia.
targetString: Kwa kuongezea, visa vya maambukizo kutoka kwa mtu mmoja hadi mwingine viliripotiwa na Wizara ya Afya huko Tunisia.

sourceString: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Visa viwili vilivyothibitisha vinahusisha watu ambao wanaonekana kupata ugonjwa kutoka kwa marehemu baba yao ambaye alikuwa mgonjwa baada ya kutembelea Katari na Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
targetString: Hata hivyo, inaonekana virusi hivyo vilikuwa na shida ya kuenea kutoka kwa mtu mmoja hadi mwingine, kwa kuwa watu wengi ambao wameambukizwa hawaambukizi wengine virusi hivyo.

sourceString: The final name for the virus is Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Jina la mwisho la virusi hivyo ni virusi vya korona vya Mashariki ya Kati vya matatizo ya kupumua (MERS-CoV).

sourceString: The only U.S. cases (both survived) were recorded in May 2014.In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in the Republic of Korea, when a man who had traveled to the Middle East, visited four hospitals in the Seoul area to treat his illness.
targetString: Visa nchini Marekani (ambao wote walipona) vilivripotiwa mwezi Mei 2014.Mnamo Mei 2015, mlipuko wa MERS-CoV ulitokea katika Jamhuri ya Korea, ambapo mwanaume ambaye alisafri kuenda Mashariki ya Kati, alitembelea hospitali nne katika eneo la Seoul ili kutibu ugonjwa wake.

sourceString: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV outside the Middle East.
targetString: Hii ilisababisha moja ya milipuko kubwa ya MERS-CoV nje ya Mashariki ya Kati.

sourceString: As of December 2019, 2,468 cases of MERS-CoV infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
targetString: Hadi Desemba 2019, visa 2,468 vya maambukizo ya MERS-CoV vilithibitishwa na vipimo vya maabara, 851 kati yao walikuwa mamekufa, kiwango cha vifo cha takriban asilimia 34.5.

sourceString: In December 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in Wuhan, China.
targetString: Mwezi wa Desemba 2019, mlipuko wa nimonia uliripitiwa huko Wuhan, Uchina.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-nCoV by the World Health Organization (WHO), later renamed SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses.
targetString: Tarehe 31 Desemba 2019, mlipuko huo ulitokana na aina mpya ya virusi vya korona, ambao ulipewa jina la muda la 2019-CoV na Shrika la Afya Duniani (WHO), baadaye lilibadilishwa jina kuwa SARS-CoV-2 na Kamati ya Kimatafa ya Uainisho wa Virusi.

sourceString: Some researchers have suggested the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.As of 17 April 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
targetString: Baadhi ya watafiti wamependekeza kuwa Soko la Jumla la Dagaa la Huan linaweza kuwa sio chanzo cha kwanza cha maambukizo ya vrusi hivyo kwa wanadamu. Hadi tarehe 17 Aprili 2020, kumekuwa na angalau vifo 153,822 vilivyothibitishwa na zaidi ya visa 2,240,191 vilivyothibitishwa vya ugonjwa wa nimonia wa virusi vya korona.

sourceString: The Wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of Betacoronavirus from group 2B with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the SARS-CoV.
targetString: Aina ya Wuhan imetambuliwa kama aina mpya ya Betacoronavirus kutoka kwa kundi 2B na takriban asilimia 78 kufanana kwa kimaumbile na SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
targetString: Virusi hivyo vinafanana kwa asilimia 96 na virusi vya korona vya popo, kwa hivyo vinashukiwa sana kutoka kwa popo pia.

sourceString: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
targetString: Ugonjwa huu umesababisha vizuizi vya kusafiri na nchi kadhaa kuzuia watu kutoka nje.

sourceString: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vimetambuliwa kusababisha hali za kipatholojia katika dawa ya mifugo tangu miaka ya 1930.

sourceString: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
targetString: Isipokuwa kwa mkamba wa kuambukiza, ugonkwa kuu unaohusiana uko kwenye sehemu ya matumbo

sourceString: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
targetString: Virusi vya korona kimsingi vinaathiri sehemu ya juu ya njia ya pumu na njia ya gesi za utumbo ya wanyama na ndege.

sourceString: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
targetString: Pia husababisha maradhi anuwai katika mifugo na wanyama kipenzi, ambao baadhi yao wanaweza kuwa na hatari kubwa kwa tasnia ya kilimo.

sourceString: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
targetString: Katika kuku, virusi vya mkamba vya kuambukiza (IBV), virusi vya korona, hulenga sio tu mfumo wa kupumia, lakini pia mfumo wa mkojo.

sourceString: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
targetString: Virusi hivyo vinaweza kuenea kwa viungo tofauti ndani ya kuku.

sourceString: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vinavyoathiri uchumi wa mifugo vinajumuisha virusi vya korona vya nguruwe (virusi vya korona vinavyoweza kuambukiza vya sumu katika tumbo TGE) na virusi vya korona vya ng'ombe, ambayvo husababisha wanyama wadogo kuhara.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya paka: aina mbili, virusi vya korona vyenye nguvu vya paka ni viini vyenye umuhimu mdogo wa kliniki, lakini mababadiliko ya kikemikali ya virusi hivi vinaweza kusababisha uvimbe wa kuambukiza wa paka (FOP), ugonjwa unaohusishwa na vifo vingi.

sourceString: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
targetString: Vivyo hivyo, kuna aina mbili ya virusi vya korona ambavyo huambukiza sungura; Virusi vyenye nguvu ya korona vya sungura husababisha ugonjwa kwenye matumbo unaojulikana na epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE) na toleo la kuuwa sana la kimfumo la virusi hvyo (kama FIP kwenye paka) linalojulikana kana virusi vya korona vya mfumo vya sungura (FSC).

sourceString: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
targetString: Kuna aina mbili ya virusi vya korona vya mbwa (CCoV), moja inayosababisha ugonjwa usio mkali kwenye tumbo na nyingine ambayo imepatikana kusababisha matatizo ya kupumua.

sourceString: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
targetString: Virusi vya homa ya manjano ya kipanya (MHV) ni virusi vya korona ambavyo husababisha magonjwa ya mlipuko kutoka kwa panya na vifo vya juu, haswa kwa utumbo wa panya za maabara.

sourceString: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
targetString: Virusi vya sialodacryoadenitis (SDAV) ni virusi vya korona vya vinavyoambukiza sana kutoka kwa panya za maabara, ambavyo vinaweza kusambazwa kati ya watu kwa utangamano wa moja kwa moja na pasipo utangamano kupitia erosoli.

sourceString: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
targetString: Baadhi ya aina za MHV zinasababisha kuendelea kwa uvimbe wa ubongo katika panya ambayo imetumika kama mfano wa puku kwa ugonjwa wa neva.

sourceString: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
targetString: Juhudi muhimu za utafiti umelenga kufafanua wazi asili ya virusi hivi vya korona vya mnyama, haswa na wataalamu wa virusi wanaopendezwa na magonjwa ya mifugo na vinavyosambazwa kutoka kwa mnyama hadi kwa mwanadamu.

sourceString: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya nguruwe (virusi vya korona vya kuambukiza vya uvimbe kwenye tumbo kutoka kwa nguruwe, TGEV).

sourceString: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya ng'ombe (BCV), husababisha uvimbe kali kwenye tumbo ya ndama wachanga.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya paka (FCoV) husababisha uvimbe mdogo kwenye tumbo ya paka na pia ugonjwa mkali ya kuambukiza wa uvimbe wa ngozi ya fumbatio kwenye paka (magonjwa mengine ya virusi hivyo).

sourceString: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
targetString: aina mbili za virusi vya korona vya mbwa (CCoV) (moja inayosababisha mwako wa tumbo, na nyingine inayopatikana katika magonjwa ya kupumua).

sourceString: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
targetString: Virusi vya korona vya batamzinga (TCV) husababsha mwako wa tumbo kwenye batamzinga.

sourceString: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
targetString: Virusi vya korona kwenye tumbo ya sungura husababisha mwako wa tumbo kwenye paka.

sourceString: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
targetString: Virusi vya korona kwenye mfumo wa paka husababisha  ugonjwa kama FIP kwenye mfumo kwa paka.

sourceString: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
targetString: Virusi vya korona kwenye tumbo ya sungura husababisha ugonjwa mkali wa uvimbe wa tumbo na kuhara kwa sungura mdogo huko Ulaya.

sourceString: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
targetString: Ugonjwa wa mlipuko wa nguruwe kuhara (PED au PEDV), umeibuka ulimwenguni kote.
